overview: The drama never stops in a house of lesbians! Mercedes Carrera and Chanel Preston are lesbian lovers who love manipulating the younger girls in their house. Sweet innocent redhead Jackie Marie learns the power of lesbian love. Mercedes preys upon virginal Vanessa Veracruz for a taste of her holy communion! Finally, Prinzzess, Remy LaCroix, and Jackie Marie have a steamy lesbian threeway in their bedroom!
title: Lesbian PsychoDramas 20
